about_the_game:
Note: You can play this mode for free if you already own Barro or Barro 2020.

"Barro Racing - Origins" brings back the first cars from the series, now with all improvements and additions.

The game:

  • Casual race, just have fun.

  • Time trial, do your best and compete with players all around the world, lap-by-lap.

  • Up to 4 players local multiplayer, split screen, challenge your friends!
